ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Friends

Class FriendsProfileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Friends.FriendsProfileController

  • public class FriendsProfileController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for handling interactions from the FriendsProfileActivity. The controller manages clicks to the "Remove Friend", "Back" and "Track Friend" buttons in the FriendsProfileActivity's layout. Clicking the remove button will remove the friend whose profile was being viewed in the FriendsProfileActivity from the user's friend's list, the track button toggles whether the user is tracking that friend or not, and the back button returns the user back to the previous FriendsListActivity.

      Constructs a controller with the activity this constructor is attached to.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FriendsProfileController

        public FriendsProfileController(FriendsProfileActivity activity)
        Constructs a controller with the activity this constructor is attached to. Each controller can only be used by one activity.
        Parameters:
        activity - - The activity this controller is attached to

    • Method Detail

      • removeFriendButtonOnClick

        public void removeFriendButtonOnClick()
        Handles removing the friend displayed in the FriendsProfileActivity from the user's friends list after the user clicks the "Delete Friend" button. The system uses a state variable that remembers which friend in the user's friends list was clicked on last to know which friend to remove. If the friend is being tracked, remove the friend from the tracked friends list as well.

      • viewInventoryButtonOnClick

        public void viewInventoryButtonOnClick()
        Handles the "View Inventory" button click in the FriendsProfileActivity. Sends the user to the FriendsInventoryActivity.

      • trackedRadioButtonOnClick

        public void trackedRadioButtonOnClick()
        Handles click for the "Track Friends" radio button in the FriendsProfileActivity. This button toggles whether a friend is tracked by the user or not. If the friend was untracked by the user before the click, they will become tracked. If the friend was tracked before the click, they will be removed from the user's tacked friends list and will become untracked. The system uses an state variable that remembers which friend in the user's friends list was clicked on last to know which friend to track/untrack.

      • backToFriendsListButtonFromProfileOnClick

        public void backToFriendsListButtonFromProfileOnClick()
        Handles click to the "Back To Friends List" button, which returns the user to their to FriendsListActivity. Any changes made to the friends list, such as untracking the friend, will be shown in the FriendsListActivity they return to.
